    • findAllCompaniesByAccessibility

      protected List<Company> findAllCompaniesByAccessibility(boolean isAccessible)
      Get the list of companies that are accessible or not depending on parameter
      Parameters:
      isAccessible - true if we want the accessible companies, false if we want the inaccessible companies.
      Returns:
      the list of companies.

    • findAllAccessibleCompanies

      public List<Company> findAllAccessibleCompanies()
      Return the list of companies that are accessible.
      Returns:
      The list of accessible companies if any, throws a NotFoundException otherwise.

    • findAllUnaccessibleCompanies

      public List<Company> findAllUnaccessibleCompanies()
      Return the list of companies that are not accessible.
      Returns:
      The list of companies that are not accessible if there are any, a NotFoundException is thrown otherwise.

      Return the companies where the user is a manager or masterManager.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      Returns:

    • addManager

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId addManager(org.bson.types.ObjectId companyId, org.bson.types.ObjectId managerId) throws BadArgumentsException
      Add a manager to a company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - The id of the company.
      managerId - The id of the manager to add.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated company if the manager was added, throws a BadArgumentsException otherwise.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException - if the company or the manager does not exist.

    • removeManager

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId removeManager(org.bson.types.ObjectId companyId, org.bson.types.ObjectId managerId) throws BadArgumentsException
      Removes a manager from a company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - The id of the company.
      managerId - The id of the manager.
      Returns:
      The id of the company if the manager was removed successfully, else throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException - If the company or the manager does not exist.

      userId - The id of the user.
      Returns:

    • getSetOnUpdate

      protected org.bson.conversions.Bson getSetOnUpdate(Company entity)
      Description copied from class: AbstractMongoDao
      Function used in updateOne() to set the fields to update. Must be implemented in the child class.
      Specified by:
      getSetOnUpdate in class AbstractMongoDao<Company>
      Returns:
      the Bson object to use in updateOne(). Must be something like this : Updates.combine( Updates.set("runtime", 99), Updates.addToSet("genres", "Sports"), Updates.currentTimestamp("lastUpdated"));
